Class AI

java.lang.Object
  Player
      AI

public class AI
extends Player

The AI class defines a Player that does everything a Player would do in real time, except automatically.

Version:
May 23, 2015
Author:
William Wang, Aditya Kotak, Rahul Sarathy., Period: 6, Assignment: MonopolyGame, Sources: none

Method Summary
 void AIbuyHotel(PropertySpace s, javax.swing.JTextArea text)
          This method buys a hotel for the AI as long as the AI has enough money and there is not a hotel on the property space.
 void AIbuyHouse(PropertySpace s, javax.swing.JTextArea text)

 void run()

Method Detail

run

public void run()
Method that automatically runs through all the tasks a player does, complete with choice.

AIbuyHouse

public void AIbuyHouse(PropertySpace s,
                       javax.swing.JTextArea text)
This method buys houses for the AI. It budgets 75% of the current amount of money to be used for buying houses.

Parameters:
s - the property for which the house is being bought for.

AIbuyHotel

public void AIbuyHotel(PropertySpace s,
                       javax.swing.JTextArea text)
This method buys a hotel for the AI as long as the AI has enough money and there is not a hotel on the property space.

Parameters:
s - the property space for which a hotel is being bought.
